title: Technology Agnostic
description:
Connect any technology. If a technology can send and/or receive data, it can be connected to MESG.

Connections can come from any web service, blockchain technology, IoT or private event system

You get the idea, anything with data can be connected to MESG.

title: Event Driven
description:
Imperative programming is so old-school. We want real-time and event-driven applications that are really reactive.

Soon, the only business logic you’ll have to write is the description of how you want to execute a specific task.

Your Application will be a simple list of when ... and then ...

title: Minimal coding
description:
Building features onto your application is really simple when it’s event-driven and service-oriented. You don't even need coding skills to create an application.

Simply imagine a specific workflow, describe it in a workflow file and your application is all set and ready to run.

title: Decentralized
description:
Decentralization is more than just a hot topic, it's a new way to create applications where users no longer need to use servers or make sure those servers are running 100% of the time.

With MESG, your application’s services will soon run everywhere, and every part of your application will be executed by different actors on the network.
